main.name: Anshul Chaudhary
main.description: An Innovator at Heart, a Visionary in Practice: My journey in technology is a vibrant tapestry of creativity and problem-solving, dedicated to crafting solutions that not only meet the needs of today but also pave the way for the future
main.bio1: Hello, I'm Anshul Chaudhary, a passionate and experienced software engineer with a keen interest in Machine Learning and Data Modeling. My career in the tech industry is diverse, spanning various roles and projects, where I've developed a deep understanding of programming languages, database management, and algorithm design. Continuously enhancing my skills in modern technologies, I am currently pursuing a Masterâ€™s degree in Software Engineering Systems from Northeastern University.
main.bio2: I have two years of industrial experience at JPMorgan Chase & Co., where I have notably improved trade management systems, achieving substantial gains in operational efficiency and process optimization. I thrive on challenges and am always on the lookout for new opportunities to apply my skills in developing innovative solutions. My commitment to continuous learning and growth fuels my ambition to meaningfully contribute to the tech community.
main.contactmessage: Please fill the details below and I'll contact you ASAP!

education.degree: Master of Science, Software Engineering Systems
education.description: This program encompassed a range of subjects including advanced software engineering principles, design patterns, and data science methodologies, providing the skills necessary to address intricate software systems and data-related tasks.
The program provided a strong foundation in fundamental IT concepts, including algorithmic thinking, database management, and software principles.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Played a key role in a team at JPMorgan Chase & Co. to modernize legacy systems, enhancing high-speed booking processes and leading Python workflow redesign to boost operational efficiency by 80%. Developed a GraphQL API to cut booking execution time by 66%, onboarded and trained four team members, and resolved critical booking system issues, demonstrating expertise as a subject matter expert in two strategic platform tools.

publications.name: Detecting Malware, Malicious URLs and Virus Using Machine Learning and Signature Matching
